overview: Elder Rim has been causing quite a stir within the order with rumors circulating about his thick cock. When word reaches President Lee, he decides he must see if these rumors are true. President Lee is concerned that the seriousness of the order sometimes overshadows the importance of camaraderie, so he's taken it on himself to put Elders Rim and Packer through some light-hearted hazing. Elder Call has been hearing over and over about Elder Rim's prowess as a top, and he's growing tired of dealing as if he's the only missionary who's been left out of the loop. So he goes into full seduction mode to learn if Rim will have the same impact on him. As President Oaks instructs Elders Rim and Call through the sacred Washing and Anointing ritual, he's unable to keep his mind from picturing the young men embracing one another, and he's eager to witness their sexual awakening first hand.
title: Elder Rim: Chapters 1-4
